Date: Thursday, 5/1/1998
Subject: Paul Byrd healing process
Paul Byrd is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Subject: Progress of Kenshin Kawakami
Dear Sir,

He has an ERA of 1.16, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
